articles.title: U.S. border to remain closed until at least Aug. 21 - CBC.ca
articles.description: The U.S. land border will remain closed to non-essential travel until at least Aug. 21, according to a renewal order issued by the American government Wednesday.
articles.content:
The U.S. land border will remain closed to non-essential travel until at least Aug. 21, according to a renewal order issued by the American government Wednesday.

articles.title: Nearly half a million Pfizer COVID-19 doses arrive in PH - CNN Philippines
articles.description: The 562,770 vaccine doses are part of the 40 million the country bought from the American pharmaceutical firm after signing a supply agreement last month.
articles.content:
Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, July 21) - Over half a million doses of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccines procured by the national government arrived Wednesday evening.

articles.title: Sweden stun gold medal favourites USA in women's football at Tokyo Olympics - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: The Americans, ranked No. 1 in the world and the favourites to win gold in Tokyo, were riding a 44-match unbeaten streak heading into the match.
articles.content:
Sweden didn't have to bunker down on defence against the Americans this time.
